jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Belgium, Brussels

Senior

Contract

Hiring Process

Time to Answer

2 open days

Process

1 Phone Call

1 Onsite Interview

Days to get an Offer

4 Days after Interview

Overview

Android Developer with strong clean code principles, knowledge of Googleâ€™s Android design principles, Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, TDD, Material 3 design, and Android SDKs. Skilled in RESTful APIs, Docker, Groovy, and Git tools.

Job Responsibilities
â€¢ Translating requirements into high quality code
â€¢ Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Kotlin code for the Android platform
â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ship new features
â€¢ Work with outside data sources and APIs
â€¢ Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
â€¢ Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
â€¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
â€¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
â€¢ Embodying the SCRUM values: Focus, Commitment, Openness, Respect, and Courage
â€¢ You dare to challenge the requirements you receive based on your expertise
â€¢ You contribute to the constant improvement of the functioning of the team

Must Have Skills
â€¢ Bachelor/Master or equivalent by experience
â€¢ Good knowledge of clean code principles and the ability to apply them effectively
â€¢ Understanding of Googleâ€™s Android design principles and interface guidelines, DDD and best practices
â€¢ Ability to write readable code and perform refactoring when necessary
â€¢ Proven knowledge of Kotlin, Jetpack Compose and Material 3 design
â€¢ Familiarity with Test Driven Development (TDD) and practical experience applying it
â€¢ Proven knowledge in Android app development (different version of Android SDK and the libraries available for common tasks)
â€¢ Knowledge of SVN/Git (Gitlab or alternative), Jenkins, SonarQube, Fortify, Confluence, JIRA
â€¢ Knowledge of Continuous Integration/Deployment principles
â€¢ Experience with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services and 3rd-party libraries or APIâ€™s
â€¢ Knowledge of Docker, Container and Groovy
â€¢ Practical experience with Scrum in a team of many developers
â€¢ Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirement
â€¢ Familiar with Pair Programming and prepared to apply it actively
â€¢ Strong command of English, along with proficiency in at least one local language

Nice to have
â€¢ Ability to effectively share knowledge with the team
â€¢ A positive attitude and a pragmatic approach
â€¢ Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively in a team environment
â€¢ Result-oriented, structured, and organized

What's great in the job?
â€¢ Great team of smart people, in a friendly and open culture
â€¢ No dumb managers, no stupid tools to use, no rigid working hours
â€¢ No waste of time in enterprise processes, real responsibilities and autonomy
â€¢ Expand your knowledge of various business industries
â€¢ Create content that will help our users on a daily basis
â€¢ Real responsibilities and challenges in a fast evolving company

Work at yechte

We are an independent digital consultancy with ambitious goals and a global presence. We support a diverse range of companies, building digital teams and delivering innovative digital solutions. Our multicultural and diverse workforce, comprised of â€˜Global Citizensâ€™, reflects this inclusivity.

We care about work-life balance and meeting the expectation of a growing team, investing in people because they are our greatest asset. Our consistent growth is a testament to this commitment.

Come work at yechte, a company on the rise, offering excellent benefits, opportunities for personal development, and the chance to learn from accomplished leaders. We are always looking for exceptional professionals to join our team.

What We Offer

Each employee has a chance to see the impact of his work. You work on real digital projects and make tangible contributions to the company. We want to provide to each individual personal, professional and social growth.

Attractive Benefits

We care about your comfort. At yechte we offer cost-effective and eco-friendly mobility plans, food allowances, and comprehensive healthcare support, enhancing employee satisfaction.

Personal Development

We care about your growth. At yechte we offer to boost your personal growth through tailored IT trainings and certifications, fostering a culture of agility and tech-driven expertise.

Flexibility

We care about your wellbeing. At yechte we offer flexi-hours and hybrid home/office work arrangements, enhancing employee work-life balance and productivity.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer - 4411
jobs_results.description:
At 4411, we are committed to making parking a hassle-free experience for all car users. With over 3 million registered users, 4411 is the largest parking application in Belgium. Our app allows you to pay for your parking session easily and remotely, by the minute. In addition to street parking, we also offer parking in garages, purchase of De Lijn and NMBS tickets, and charging of electric vehicles.

We are constantly working on new and exciting features to further support our community. To achieve our goals and continue to grow, we are looking for an Android Developer!

As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for maintaining and expanding the current 4411 Android app. The app is already fully written in Kotlin (2% Java) and broadly follows the best practices defined by Google. We have also started the transition to Jetpack Compose, with new screens being fully written in Compose and older ones being refactored. You will be jointly responsible for maintaining our >99.75% "crash-free rate" and our 4.6 Play Store rating, something we are very proud of!

What do we expect from you?
â€¢ You have at least 4 years of experience with native Android development.
â€¢ You have solid experience with GIT.
â€¢ You are a true front-end enthusiast: you get excited about beautiful UIs and actively think about UX while striving for a smooth user experience.
â€¢ Clean code principles make you happy, and you enjoy contributing to the modular architecture of the app, which already has its blueprint laid out. The code you write is highly readable and easy to test.
â€¢ Youâ€™re excited about new techniques and features within Android and keep up to date with them. Testing and evaluating their utility within the app is a challenge you enjoy.
â€¢ You have experience with CI/CD.
â€¢ You are fluent in Kotlin (but also comfortable with Java).
â€¢ You have a solid understanding of MVVM, clean architecture, and async programming (using Coroutines / Flow).
â€¢ Nice to have: Knowledge of writing performant Jetpack Compose code and improving it using Baseline profiles and Compose performance inspection.
â€¢ Nice to have: Knowledge of the following tools & libraries: Gradle build system, Jetpack libraries (ViewModel, (Compose) navigation, WorkManager, â€¦), Retrofit, Room, Koin DI.
â€¢ Nice to have: Knowledge of Kotlin Multiplatform.
â€¢ Nice to have: Experience with the following non-Android tools: Figma, Bitrise, Lokalise, Firebase, Jira & Confluence.
â€¢ You are fluent in Dutch and proficient in English & French.

Donâ€™t let new things scare you off, if you have right learning attitude, weâ€™d love to welcome you!

As a fast growing tech company we indulge cutting-edge technologies and we invest in durable and interesting careers where we map your professional growth on the opportunities within Be-Mobile.

Youâ€™ll feel at home if you share values like integrity and open feedback. Our young, trustworthy and passionate team players are curious to get to know you! Are you as well?

We provide a very interesting total remuneration package, flexible working hours and healthy team initiatives, which we will explain during the selection process.

jobs_results.title: Android Engineer
jobs_results.description:
About Us

ðŸ‘‹ Hey there! Before we dive into the job details, let's give you a quick rundown of our company.

At November Five, we're not just about digital solutions; we're about creating memorable experiences with more amazement, more heart, and more results. As the go-to digital partner for customer experience leaders like Coca-Cola, Spotify, Telenet, Le Pain Quotidien, and Mediahuis, we defy mediocrity and choose projects that make a real impact.

Our culture thrives on ownership and collaboration, where your work leaves a mark. To get the best out of ourselves, we work from our office or remotely and invite others over to our collaboration hub for some inspiration.

With a team of 60+ experts based in Antwerp, we've been on a digital adventure since 2008 and are excited for what's to come!

About The Job

As an Android Engineer at November Five, you will create memorable digital experiences that resonate, inspire, and endure.

IF YOU JOIN US, YOU WILL:
â€¢ Design and develop innovative digital experiences across multiple mobile platforms
â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance user engagement and satisfaction
â€¢ Leverage and enrich our way of working on technology and product level
â€¢ Implement responsive design practices to ensure seamless performance on various devices
â€¢ Optimize applications and workflows for speed and efficiency in digital solutions
â€¢ Utilize analytics tools to monitor and analyze user behavior and feedback
â€¢ Continuously explore new technologies and frameworks to improve digital offerings
â€¢ Keep up-to-date with the fast-evolving landscape of technologies and innovations, sharing your knowledge and expertise with your teammates

Requirements

THE SKILLS YOU WILL BRING:
â€¢ Proven experience in digital product engineering
â€¢ Are well-versed, experienced, and truly passionate about Android development. You know Kotlin (multiplatform) and Jetpack compose insode out
â€¢ Have hands-on experience with mobile development environments like Android Studio
â€¢ Master the art of coding: your code is clean and understandable, and you're proud of it!
â€¢ You've worked with databases and 3rd party SDKs
â€¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
â€¢ Strong grasp of software development best practices, including various methodologies and techniques
â€¢ Experience with scrum - that's a big plus!
â€¢ Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in teams
â€¢ A mindset aligned with our values of amazement, heart, and results
â€¢ Eagerness to contribute to projects that move people, organizations, and society

Benefits

KEEP READING IF YOU...
â€¢ Share our values of working for impact and customer obsession
â€¢ Are passionate about digital & innovation
â€¢ Could bring value to the table within a certain field of experience and knowledge (software development, sales, marketing, business consultancy, ...)

FIVE REASONS TO APPLY RIGHT NOW
â€¢ Aim for impact: we work towards meaningful impact on the digital experience of millions by building products for clients like Spotify, Coca-Cola, Telenet, VRT, or Brussels Airport.
â€¢ Continue to grow: with our support, you can define your career path at N5. Meet with your Solution or Technology Leader for regular check-ins or lead a technology initiative to learn a new skill. The sky's the limit at N5.
â€¢ Unite in a cooperative spirit: thrive in close-knit teams - or squads as we call them - and mingle with like-minded peers both at work or during our after-hour activities.
â€¢ Find your balance: flexible hours and a hybrid work policy that allows you to choose your work location.
â€¢ Enjoy a fully optimized salary package: including - depending on your role & expertise - a company car, pension plan, top-notch health & well-being insurance, hospitalization insurance, MacBook, a smartphone with subscription, net expenses, meal vouchers, yearly bonus, and 32 holidays

jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
About Showpad

At Showpad, personalities and cultures connect across oceans to create something extraordinary. As a top software company in the Inc. 5,000 Europe list, Showpad is changing the game when it comes to sales enablement. Our employees create the engagement and impact that drives our success as we expand globally.

In the morning, weâ€™re drinking San Francisco cold brew coffee with a side of Portland doughnuts â€“ English scones for afternoon tea, and in the evening weâ€™re toasting success with Belgian tripel Westmalle to a Chicago house tune.

About the position

As an Android Engineer, youâ€™ll hold the reigns on our widely used Android app, and thus shape the future of the Showpad product and hone it to perfection. Your insights and ideas will play a decisive role in how the Showpad product feels in the hands of our users. You will continuously improve the tooling on developing and deploying changes to our application. In addition, you will coach but also learn good practices in Android development.

Key responsibilities as an Android Mobile Engineer at Showpad
â€¢ Work closely with the Showpad Design team and Backend Software Engineering teams
â€¢ Improve our existing native application written in Kotlin and Java
â€¢ Develop high quality and stable features by using a TDD approach
â€¢ Do R&D by experimenting with and implementing the latest technologies
â€¢ Refine our build and deploy processes
â€¢ Work together with our QA teams and monitoring to identify and fix issues

Skills and Qualifications we are looking for
â€¢ A bachelor or higher in a computer science oriented field or study or an equivalent through experience
â€¢ Great understanding of quality and how to improve quality processes
â€¢ Healthy sense of modern UI/UX design
â€¢ The ability to deliver great working native Android apps
â€¢ The hunger to stay fresh with Android frameworks and the latest Android additions
â€¢ Experience with Realm, SQLite, OkHttp and Coroutines would be a plus
â€¢ Passion for life and the Showpad product
â€¢ The will to have a maximum impact on Showpad
â€¢ The desire to grow yourself, your team and the company

What you can expect from Showpad

Focus on Impact and Growth

We are building the future in sales and marketing where every sales person is successful. As an international scale-up, we aim for yearly double digit growth that opens many opportunities. We want people who thrive in a fast-paced, performance-driven company, who are not afraid to stretch themselves in a fun environment, and focus on impact and growth.

jobs_results.title: Lead Developer Mobile Apps (iOS / Android) for Digital Health - Consulting
jobs_results.description:
At EY, youâ€™ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And weâ€™re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

You will be part of EYâ€™s EMEIA-based Digital Health Excellence Center (DHEC). Our mission is to improve health outcomes and patient experiences. As the DHEC, we bring our expert knowledge and delivery power to industry-leading healthcare providers in collaboration with the local firms.

The opportunity

As a senior developer, you will work alongside a team of international experts in technology, business and the healthcare industry. The end-to-end development and implementation of mobile apps is at the core of the DHEC, with you we want to further strengthen our technical expertise.

Your key responsibilities

As a senior developer, you are responsible for the development and implementation of innovative mobile software solutions for our healthcare clients. In your role, you will collaborate with clinical teams, administrators, and other healthcare professionals to prioritize and address health-specific software needs.

As technical expert, you work together with the development team in the creation of customer journey and user stories, you coordinate with UI/UX designers, and you collaborate with the software architects to implement functionality that is suitable for specific client needs. Additionally, you will be responsible for near- and off-shore technical teams, vendors, and external partners to ensure our products are consistent and reliable, as well as provide training and support in business development.

Skills and attributes for success
â€¢ Strong written and verbal communication, presentation, client service and technical writing skills for both technical and business audiences.
â€¢ Fluency in English and Proficiency in the local language of your country of residence is required.
â€¢ Knowledge of additional languages will be appreciated.
â€¢ Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
â€¢ Ability to work under tight timelines for multiple project deliveries in parallel.
â€¢ Ability/flexibility to travel.

To qualify for the role, you must have
â€¢ Bachelorâ€™s degree in informatics, Mathematics, (Software) Engineering or other related field with strong IT focus. Master's or further certification are advantageous.
â€¢ Minimum of 2 years of working experience in a healthcare context and particular focus on implementing custom applications on mobile operating systems.
â€¢ Deep understanding of development in iOS and Android using e.g. Swift, SwiftUI, Kotlin, and Jetpack Compose. Basic understanding of both operating systems is a prerequisite.
â€¢ Expert knowledge of software architecture on all levels, i.e. network, infrastructure, security, persistence, application, and frontend.
â€¢ Proven work experience in driving international development teams and managing different stakeholder groups, e.g. project managers, Scrum masters, product owners, business analysts, developers, and infrastructure and security architects.
â€¢ Deep understanding of programming patterns (e.g. MVC, MVVM), tools, and frameworks for development (e.g. Declarative UI, Angular, Xamarin, React).

Ideally, youâ€™ll also have
â€¢ A reliable network in the healthcare industry and a consulting track record.
â€¢ A good overview of industry technology trends and emerging technologies, understand how they apply to our healthcare clients and can drive their adoption into our projects.
â€¢ A solid understanding of health-specific interoperability formats, e.g. HL7/FHIR, SNOMED, OMOP, openEHR.
â€¢ A good knowledge of system integration in medical system landscapes between software products of various clinical domains, e.g. Electronic Medical Records (EMR), Clinical Information Systems (CIS), Clinical Data Repositories (CDR), Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS), communication servers and interoperability platforms.

What we look for

We are looking for an experienced Senior Developer with strong technical skills and a proven track record working in a healthcare context.

What working at EY offers

As part of this role, you'll work in a highly integrated, global team with the opportunity and tools to grow, develop and drive your career forward. Here, you can combine global opportunity with flexible working. The EY benefits package goes above and beyond too, focusing on your physical, emotional, financial and social well-being. Your recruiter can talk to you about the benefits available in your country.

Hereâ€™s a snapshot of what we offer:
â€¢ Continuous learning: Youâ€™ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
â€¢ Success as defined by you: Weâ€™ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
â€¢ Transformative leadership: Weâ€™ll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
â€¢ Diverse and inclusive culture: Youâ€™ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.

About EY

If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

EY | Building a better working world

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

DHEC_FY25

jobs_results.title: REMOTE / HYBRID - SENIOR EMBEDDED ANDROID DEVELOPER - MDEP - CONTRACT
jobs_results.description:
We're working for a prestigious consumer electronics company based in Belgium that is looking for an experience Embedded Android Developer for a cutting edge conferencing platform project.

We're looking for a Senior Engineer that is a great communicator and can bring a team along in the are of Embedded Android Development with Java & Kotlin.

We're looking for strong Embedded Android exp from Automotive or similar embedded devices, Java, ideally Kotlin and C++ and some knowledge or interest in MDEP.

We can accept remote/hybrid after an initial project kick-off in Belgium (near the border with France).

If you're interested in this role can you share a copy of your up to date CV and we can arrange a time to discuss the client and role in more detail.

This role offers the opportunity to explore new technologies and work in a dynamic environment.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Developer
jobs_results.description:
As a Lead Mobile App Developer, you will oversee the creation of advanced mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms. You will manage cross-functional teams, convert strategic objectives into technical implementations, and ensure the delivery of high-quality, scalable, and high-performing mobile solutions.

Responsibilities:

Lead and mentor development teams, fostering technical growth and innovation.
â€¢ Design and deliver mobile solutions that are customer-focused and built to scale.
â€¢ Uphold quality standards through code reviews, testing, and implementation of best practices.
â€¢ Collaborate with stakeholders, product managers, and designers to translate user requirements into functional apps.
â€¢ Stay ahead of industry trends and integrate emerging technologies into development processes.
â€¢ Streamline CI/CD pipelines for efficient and error-free app releases.
â€¢ Diagnose and resolve complex technical challenges.

Ideal Candidate:
â€¢ 10+ years of hands-on experience in native mobile app development with expertise in Android and iOS platforms.
â€¢ Strong grasp of mobile architectural patterns (e.g., MVC, MVVM, Clean Architecture).
â€¢ Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Firebase) and API integrations.
â€¢ Proficient in programming languages like Kotlin and Swift; experience with frameworks such as Flutter, React Native, or Ionic is an advantage.
â€¢ Proven leadership in managing and mentoring development teams.
â€¢ Excellent interpersonal and collaboration skills.
â€¢ A passion for tackling challenges and driving innovation.

The Offer:
â€¢ Hybrid working in Brussels
â€¢ Long-term contract
â€¢ Day Rate flexible

Could this project interest you? If so, apply now!

jobs_results.title: Mobile Apps - Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Belgium

Our Mobile Apps teams is now hiring on our latest Tech Hub in Athens! We are looking for Senior Android Developer to join our Product development Department. You will be part of the Mobile Apps team and together we will build the best native experience in the industry.â€¯Our Product Development organisation is truly Global with cross functional teams spanning 5 Tech Hubs. These can be found in Malta, Budapest, Stockholm, Tallinn and Athens.

The Wow

At Betsson Group, we strive to deliver the best customer experience in the industry. We are one of the market leaders in iGaming, offering online gaming products in several markets, both through our own gaming sites as well as several partner brands.

You will be part of a passionate team, which is building an industry leading, scalable, multi-brand platform to support 25+ online brands! Our brands are used by hundreds of thousands of users and growing.

What we are looking for
â€¢ You will be working side by side with some of the greatest talents in the industry.
â€¢ You will be working on applications dealing with high traffic reaching worldwide audiences.
â€¢ You will be able to feel strong ownership of the things we deliver and our success.
â€¢ A friendly and supportive environment; professional development programmes and training that will help you achieve your goals and grow both technically as well as professionally.
â€¢ In addition to all of this, you will be part of the multi-cultural Betsson community.

Great if you have
â€¢ Kotlin, and an expert in Androidâ€™s frameworks and possibilities with native
â€¢ Firebase and all tools included such as analytics, Crashlytics, Firestore, Remote configuration, cloud-messaging, in-app-messaging.
â€¢ Being data driven and excellent knowledge in structuring tracking in app
â€¢ RESTful APIs and using Postman.
â€¢ Github pipeline setup
â€¢ An eye for making high quality Android views and animations.
â€¢ Scalable and performant applicationsâ€¯
â€¢ Design and implement clean, scalable, and high-quality code with unit testing experience.
â€¢ Solving problems and have good software architecture knowledge.
â€¢ Being a Team player.
â€¢ Agile development.
â€¢ Coaching and mentoring other developers.

A taster of what you will be involved with

We want to be pioneers in a highly competitive market, so we continuously strive for technical and product excellence. As part of our team, you will be building new products and features using the latest technologies; actively contributing to a state-of-the-art native, which is supporting our core brands.

Our Android Mobile apps are built in Kotlin; and consumes RESTful APIs.

As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for software development in a very self-leading Agile team with responsibility in everything from DevOps pipeline to production monitoring and support. You will be contributing directly to the success of our products by close collaboration with UX-designers, QA engineers, data analysts and other area teams. You have a strong sense of customer value and will participate in the whole value-chain discussion to contribute the how and what to make our products successful.

What we offer
â€¢ Monthly Allowance for Lunch
â€¢ Private & Life Plan Insurance for you and your family
â€¢ Team Building Budget
â€¢ Annual Wellness Allowance
â€¢ Corporate Travel Insurance
â€¢ Events and initiatives both Local (Quarterly Meetings) and Global
â€¢ Professional Development Programs & Internal Career Opportunities
â€¢ Milestone Birthday

At Betsson Group we work with a Hybrid Work From Home (WFH) model, giving you the flexibility of working 3 days in the office and 2 days at home.

Who We Are

Betsson Group is one of the largest companies within the Global iGaming space and can trace our heritage as far back as the 1960â€™s. Weâ€™re Swedish and publicly listed too with our Operational HQ located on the Mediterranean Island of Malta.

We strive to deliver the best customer experience in the industry. As a market leader within iGaming we offer online gaming products across 12+ jurisdictions and 20+ brands.

You will be part of a passionate team, which is building an industry leading, scalable, multi-brand platform used by hundreds of thousands of our customers!

Challenge Accepted?

Check out the Betsson Group Blog to find out what our employees are talking about.

By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy.

This offer from "Betsson Group" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 76% flex score.
